page.title: 17Farming.
page.content: Farming is the other main industry in the Dufftown area.Beef and Sheep farming being the main types. {Keithmore Farm is 2 miles south_east of the 12km block but is atypical example of a sheep farm in this area.The farm is 305 years old.The proprietors Mr&Mrs E. Leslie have 1527 sheep on the farm altogether(930 lambs,577 ewes,and 20 rams)They have only 1 type of sheep the Black_faced.{ {Nether Enoch. } This is a small holding which breeds beef cattle.The house was built in 1800.(This is a common feature of farms in this area as they have been inherited.)The holding conists of 110 hectares.They have 2 types of cattle: Charloias and Limosein.
